name: Spritz for en.wikipedia.org
body:
spritzReading
=============

This project is an to acknowledge the awesome spritz reading method. If spritzinc.com is not happy with this liddle project, please contact me and I will close it. :D



 This is a very ugly (sorry) proof of concept for the awesome http://learn2spritz.com/ methode for for fast reading. I implemented it only for english wikipedia articles. Please fork it.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
